item.value: The tallest person in the world was Robert Wadlow. He was 2.72 meters ( 8ft 11in ) tall.
Atari releases Pong, the first commercial video game on November 29, 1972.
The longest river is the Nile. It is 6,650 Km ( 4,132 miles ) long. It flows into the Mediterranean Sea.
The lowest temperature ever recorded world was at Vostok Station, Antarctica on the 21 July 1983. it was a bitter -89.6C
New York is the city with the biggest population in America. It has over 8.3 million inhabitants.
The blue whale is the largest known animal on Earth. The second largest animal is the Afican elephant.
Alaska is the largest state in America.
On July 20, 1969, Neil Armstrong became the first human to step on the moon. He, Edwin "Buzz" Aldrin and Michael Collins were the crew of Apollo 11.
The most widely spoken language is Mandarin, nearly 1 billion people speak it, mainly in China.

The Spine-tailed Swift is the fastest bird. It can fly at 170 kilometres per hour (105mph). The Peregrine Falcon is the fastest bird that dives headfirst down through the sky. They can travel at up to 200mph.
The world's oldest person was Kama Chinen. She lived in Japan and died a week before her 115th birthday.
The 1921 Nobel Prize in Physics was won by Albert Einstein for his work in the field of theoretical physics.
Sneezing with your eyes open is impossible
Drinking too much water too quickly can lead to water intoxication which causes an imbalance of water in the brain
If you travelled to the Moon in a plane it would take about 16 days. It takes 3 days in a spaceship to get there.
The shortfin Mako shark is the fastest fish, it can swim at 50 kilometres per hour. Olympic gold-medal swimmers could not escape even if they tried, they can only swim at 8 kph (5 mph) .
The original Olympic Games were a series of athletic competitions held in Ancient Greece.
The Surface Area of the earth is 197 million square miles, about two thirds of the Earth's surface is covered with water.
Most people blink about 17,000 times a day.
Mount McKinley in Alaska is the highest mountain in America. It is 20,320 ft high. Alaska is also the largest state in America, it is 656,425 square miles in size.
